name: bobplatesextension
title: Bob's Metals, Chemicals and Intermediates mod EXTENSION
author: dabalciunas
description:
This mod is an extension to Bob's mods.

It adds the following settings, which can be individually enabled:
  - Force water from ground water: Ground water pumpjacks extract water instead of pure water, regardless of other Bob's settings. This makes normal underground water available on super-dry desert maps.
  - Water remineralisation: Distilleries and chemical plants are able to convert pure water back into water through water remineralisation.
  - Water remineralisation with stone: Stone is an additional ingredient required for water remineralisation. Only chemical plants are able to run this process.
